name: Sweet Corn With Peppers
keywords: corn, red bell pepper, side dish, summer, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 or 2 ears fresh corn (or 1 cup frozen corn kernels)

recipeInstructions.text: Core and vein the peppers. Cut the flesh into very thin strips about 1 1/2 inches in length. There should be about 2 cups.
Set aside. Scrape the kernels from the corn. There should be about one cup.
Heat the oil and butter in a skillet and add the scallions, peppers and corn. Sprinkle with cumin, salt, pepper and garlic. Cook, shaking the skillet and stirring, about 1 1/2 minutes.
Spoon the mixture into a warm serving dish.
